description:
John W. Lee, P.C., is a Newport News law firm founded by experienced Virginia attorney John W. Lee. This law office is one of our firm's four locations in Eastern Virginia, with the others located in Hampton, Virginia Beach and Chesapeake. At our law firm, we assist clients who are overwhelmed by debt by guiding them through the bankruptcy process. In addition to our bankruptcy practice, we also defend clients who face criminal charges, along with defending those who have received traffic citations.

Our founder began practicing law in 1998 and worked for other firms until he established John W. Lee, P.C., in Hampton in 2002. In 2006, he opened our Chesapeake office, and our other two offices soon followed. Our firm's incredible growth would not have been possible were it not for the dedication of our founder and our five associate attorneys. Together, our legal team has over 70 years of experience and the knowledge and skills that come with those years.

If you are drowning in debt and you are unsure of where to turn, the attorneys at John W. Lee, P.C., can help you. If your recent arrest has left you afraid of the future, we can help you as well. Regardless of the severity of your situation, we can provide representation, support and guidance to see you through the legal process. You can find out more about our law firm by taking advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
